q: that the "investigation" will reveal that hacking was carried out by two rogues rather than one. And we won't swallow that either. Why? Note this sentence in Robinson's report: "It is also understood that Glenn Mulcaire said in the court statement that several other executives at the News of the World were aware that phone hacking was taking place, although he does not name them."
